page.title: 10ACTIVITIES WITHIN CLIPSTON
page.content: Many of the activities centre around the village hall. e.g. W.I. playschool and School Association functions. The Women's Institute meets monthly and has approximately 25 female members. Their activities include: guest speakers, outings, social evenings and the making of produce for fund raising events. There is a Bell Ringing group which has 12 members. They meet one night each week plus Sundays. Playschool is held 3 mornings per week between 9:15 and 12. It caters for 24 children between the ages of 3 and 5. A Friendship Club is run from the village and arranges several activities throughout the year. Also within the village is a Guide and Brownie Pack as well as a Cricket Club. Adult Education classes are held in the school and village hall.
